      • print

        private void print(FileSystemTree.FileNode node,
                   java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                   int depth)
        Print file system helper method it goes ever sub folder recursively prints it and looks if it has subfolder too it goes and prints recursively
        Parameters:
        node - takes node which is root
        sb - sb to build filesysyrem hieararchy
        depth - depth for the create depth when print the file system for every sub folder i increase it 3 times which means it adds three '-' character beginning of the row
